title: Need Free Hosting?
content:
Hello everybody, are you looking for free hosting service then here is the great offer for you. Host1Plus is about to launch his hosting service on 15th of April at 1:00 PM GMT! Only the first 1000 new members will be able to get the hosting service absolutely FREE for 1 Year and other new members will get the FREE hosting service for 3 Months.

So don’t miss this awesome opportunity and get your personal invitation now,

Visit: [http://vip.host1plus.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804014723/http:/vip.host1plus.com/ "http://vip.host1plus.com/")

Hope this will make you happy.

Thanks!
author: LesterBrent
